## Paginator.setBase() method

Sets first page (base) number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBase(baseVal: number): Paginator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  baseVal | <code>number</code> | Index of base page |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Paginator`
